title: No Fear?
description:
Israel Gutierrez, Sarah Spain and FTW's Charles McDonald debate if the Heat should be afraid of the Hawks if they get the No. 8 seed and if they agree with C.J. McCollum that the Pelicans will have “lots of winning” in their future.
